tags.name: Letter Grade by Expression

tags.desc: The student's percent grade in their {expression_or_period} class in the specified {term}.

tags.name: All teachers ever associated to a section
tags.desc: Note: Name format is 'last, first'. Only teachers with roles flagged for display on reports will be listed. Teachers are listed according to the sort order defined in the role module.

tags.name: All teachers currently associated to a section
tags.desc: Note: Name format is 'last, first'. Only teachers with roles flagged for display on reports will be listed. Teachers are listed according to the sort order defined in the role module.
